basics.name: Fabricio Céspedes Gómez
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Developer with strong experience in building modern web and mobile applications using Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Shadcn UI, with a focus on scalable architecture and Server-Side Rendering (SSR). Skilled in integrating RESTful and GraphQL APIs, implementing CI/CD pipelines through Azure DevOps, and delivering high-performance, maintainable solutions.  Additionally, experienced in backend and cross-platform development with Node.js, C# (.NET), and Java, as well as database management using SQL, NoSQL, Supabase and Strapi. Passionate about clean code, Agile development (SCRUM), and leveraging AI-driven tools to enhance productivity and automation.

work.name: Hikru
work.summary: At my current role, I develop and maintain modern web applications using Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and Shadcn UI, implementing Server-Side Rendering (SSR) for optimal performance and SEO. I am responsible for integrating and consuming RESTful APIs, ensuring efficient communication between the frontend and backend services. I manage version control and CI/CD pipelines through Azure DevOps, automating build, test, and deployment workflows for production environments. Following Agile methodologies under the SCRUM framework, I participate in sprint planning, backlog management, and the creation of user stories to support iterative and efficient development. Additionally, I utilize AI-powered tools to generate and enhance content, and perform end-to-end (E2E) testing using Playwright to ensure high-quality, stable releases.

work.name: Sistemas Ágil
work.summary: I was part of the development team at Sistemas Ágil, where I was fully responsible for the company’s website and contributed to the development of a POS system in C#. I also gained experience developing mobile applications with React Native, including a restaurant order management app connected to a .NET API and an inventory tracking app. Additionally, I developed an AI-powered chatbot integrated with a supermarket database, capable of generating metrics and interactive dashboards for sales, products, and customer analytics.

work.name: REGAM Parts & Equipment
work.summary: I developed a web catalog system featuring a dashboard for administrators and a customer-facing interface to browse products. The application was built using React and Firebase, following a SaaS architecture and a Mobile-First approach for both administrative and client views. Within the same project, I oversaw customer service operations, ensuring efficient communication and task management. I also collaborated with the sales team, gaining experience in customer acquisition, communication, negotiation, and overall business development.
